text:
Hello, Debu dhamaka first-year mai squash se lekar pubg, mini militia, judgment, some friendly conversations related to atheism. It was one hell of a ride kash tu last month bhi sath hota aur alag hi maze aate for the context you can contact Jagga sir xD xD.
You are a brilliant individual, hoping that you get to do something worthwhile just like you've always wanted to.
Take care and all the best,
tnk0805
author: Sohail  Ansari

text:
Dear Roomie,
On our first day at IITK, you showed up late. As everyone was getting to meet their roommates, I wondered, nice if he doesn't show up, I'll have the room to myself ðŸ˜œ, but then you did show up.
Soon after the end of that beautiful 10-day long orientation began the classes. You seemed really into the acads. You used to fall asleep while studying on the chair. At times I was really amazed by your hard work and dedication to your studies.
Remember the time you received the phone call from hall 1? ðŸ˜‚
GPL sabki leni hoti thi par jab khud ki baari aati toh waha kuch na kuch problem ho hi jaati thi. 
Experience to tune sab kar liya heart break se lekar paaji kai sath stalking bas ab Canadian NRI se shaadi baaki hai ðŸ˜‚ (bulana mat bhulna ðŸ˜œ)
Know that I respect you for the way you embrace your weaknesses aur baaki aage toh fod dega tu mehnat se.
Take care and all the best to your Canadian wife ðŸ˜‚
author: Sohail  Ansari

text:
IIT Delhi phir IIT Kanpur Hall 5 phir D-MID kuch aise apni shuruwat hui, first year mai wo udghosh wala poker tournament aur fir pehli summer mai wo judgement wali raate aise kuch silsila jaari raha.
Jaise jaise tujhe samajh nai laga tu kaafi complicated laga courtesy of your mood swings par most of the times teri kaafi aachi side bhi dekhne mili jaise tera helpful character, the way you care about the people in need. Kaafi yaadein hai sath mai wing, Goa, bayesian, game theory and most importantly the night jab kathi rolls khane gaye the yadav mai tu aur tera roomie (xD xD). Hum jaa rahe hai tum ruk rahe ho yaad toh kaafi aayegi par bhai hai tu apna milte rahenge, baate likhne ko to itni hai ki bas likhte hi rahe par senti ho jayenge to khatam karte hai.
You have a good heart I hope you preserve it that way.
Take care Mr. M
author: Sohail  Ansari
